name: Snow Valley Resort
description: Nestled in the Himalayas, our resort offers cozy wooden cabins with breathtaking mountain views and easy access to skiing slopes.

name: Manali Heights
description: Luxurious rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows showcasing panoramic mountain vistas, featuring an infinity pool and spa services.

name: Goa Beach Resort
description: Beachfront property with private beach access, tropical gardens, and sea-facing balconies in every room.

name: Goa Sunset Inn
description: Charming Portuguese-style villa offering stunning sunset views over the Arabian Sea, just steps from popular beaches.

name: Jaipur Palace Hotel
description: Authentic Rajput architecture with modern amenities, featuring courtyard gardens and traditional Rajasthani cuisine.

name: Pink City Inn
description: Centrally located budget hotel with clean rooms, rooftop restaurant, and walking distance to major attractions.

name: Delhi Grand
description: Contemporary luxury in the heart of Delhi, featuring a multi-cuisine restaurant and easy metro access to business districts.

name: Red Fort Hotel
description: Heritage property near Old Delhi's landmarks, blending Mughal-era charm with modern comfort and authentic local cuisine.

name: Shimla Hilltop
description: Perched on a hill with 360-degree mountain views, offering cozy fireplaces and guided nature walks.

name: Mall Road Lodge
description: Charming colonial-era property right on Shimla's famous Mall Road, steps from shopping and entertainment.

name: Himalayan Breeze Inn
description: Family-run inn with spacious verandas offering uninterrupted mountain views and homemade Himachali meals.

name: Apple Valley Cottages
description: Secluded cottages surrounded by apple orchards, featuring private gardens and orchard-to-table dining experiences.

name: Manali Pine Retreat
description: Eco-friendly retreat nestled in dense pine forests, with nature trails and outdoor yoga spaces.

name: Ocean Pearl Goa
description: 5-star beach resort featuring infinity pools, water sports, and private cabanas with butler service.

name: Coconut Grove Inn
description: Boutique property with hammocks strung between coconut trees, offering Goan-Portuguese fusion cuisine.

name: Goa Riverside Stay
description: Tranquil riverside villas with kayak access to nearby beaches and sunset river cruises.

name: Amber Fort Residency
description: Traditional haveli-style hotel with rooftop views of Amber Fort, offering heritage walks and puppet shows.

name: Royal Haveli Stay
description: 16th-century restored haveli featuring hand-painted frescoes, courtyard dining, and turban-tying workshops.

name: City View Hotel Jaipur
description: Modern budget hotel with rooftop restaurant offering panoramic views of Jaipur's pink cityscape.

name: Lotus Deluxe Inn
description: Business-friendly hotel with soundproof rooms, co-working spaces, and quick access to Delhi's metro network.

name: Heritage Residency Delhi
description: Colonial-era building converted into a boutique hotel, featuring antique furnishings and a heritage walk program.

name: Connaught Inn
description: Premium location in CP's inner circle, offering designer rooms and proximity to high-end shopping and dining.

name: Evergreen Resort Shimla
description: Year-round greenery surrounds this peaceful resort offering guided nature walks and birdwatching tours.

name: Snow Crest Hotel
description: Winter wonderland retreat with heated rooms, indoor games, and direct access to skiing slopes.

name: Valley View Inn
description: Every room features a private balcony overlooking lush valleys, with sunrise yoga sessions available.

name: Manali River Retreat
description: Luxury tents and cottages along the Beas River, offering bonfire nights and trout fishing experiences.

name: Goa Lagoon Resort
description: Serene backwater property with lagoon-facing villas, Ayurvedic spa, and sunset boat tours.

name: Jaipur Jewel Stay
description: Gemstone-themed hotel near Johari Bazaar, offering jewelry shopping tours and gemstone workshops.

name: Delhi View Point Hotel
description: High-rise hotel with observation deck offering 360-degree city views, including India Gate and Rashtrapati Bhavan.

name: Shimla Cloud Retreat
description: Perched at high altitude, this property often sits above the clouds, offering a magical floating experience.
